specifications.Finish: Decoration > Sequin Sequin fabric is a stylish material covered with flat plastic or metal embellishments that come in various sizes, shapes, and colors. It creates a sparkling, eye-catching effect and is commonly used for partywear, evening gowns, and stage costumes.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Regenerated > Lyocell This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Partywear, Dresses
